profile_summary:

My technical acumen encompasses CI/CD practices, observability, performance tuning, and security, ensuring the development of scalable and secure applications. 
I have led multiple projects focused on system design, where I successfully integrated third-party services, including **FusionAuth**, **Retool**, **Twilio**, and **SendGrid**, to enhance system capabilities. I leverage modern development methodologies and tools, encouraging efficient collaboration via **GitHub**. With a strong background in microservices and event-driven architectures, I consistently deliver high-performance solutions while maintaining seamless communication with cross-functional teams.
